00016     double Minimizer::simpleF(double &x,vector<double> &X0, 
00017                               vector<double> &dir)
00018     {
00019       int vecSize=X0.size();
00020       int i;
00021 
00022       vector<double> X(vecSize);
00023         
00024       for (i=0;i<vecSize;++i)
00025         X[i]=X0[i]+x*dir[i];
00026       theGroup->setEvaluationPoint(X);
00027       return(theGroup->getFunctionValue());
00028     }

00031     double Minimizer::simpleFandDeriv(double &x,vector<double> &X0, 
00032                                       vector<double> &dir, double &df)
00033     {
00034       int vecSize=X0.size();
00035       int i;
00036       double f;
00037 
00038       vector<double> X(vecSize);
00039       vector<double> grad(vecSize);
00040 
00041       for (i=0;i<vecSize;++i)
00042         X[i]=X0[i]+x*dir[i];
00043       theGroup->setEvaluationPoint(X);
00044       f=theGroup->getFunctionValueAndGradient(grad);
00045       df=0;
00046       for (i=0;i<vecSize;++i)
00047         df += grad[i]*dir[i];
00048       return f;
00049     }

00051     void Minimizer::bracketMinimum(double &a, double &b, double &c,
00052                                    vector<double> &X0, 
00053                                    vector<double> &direction)
00054     {
00055 
00056       double fa,fb,fc,fu;
00057       double temp;
00058       int i;
00059       const double GOLD=1.618034;
00060       const double TINY=1e-20;
00061       const double GLIMIT=100.0;
00062       bool done=false;
00063 
00064 
00065       fa=simpleF(a,X0,direction);
00066       fb=simpleF(b,X0,direction);
00067 
00068       // make sure we're going downhill from a to b
00069       if (fa < fb)        // switch role of a and b 
00070       {
00071         temp=a;   a=b;   b=temp;
00072         temp=fa; fa=fb; fb=temp;
00073       }
00074         
00075       c= b+GOLD*(b-a);
00076       fc=simpleF(c,X0,direction);
00077 
00078       while (fb > fc)
00079       {
00080         double r,q,u,denom,ulim;
00081         r=(b-a)*(fb-fc);
00082         q=(b-c)*(fb-fa);
00083         denom=q-r;
00084         if (fabs(denom)< TINY)
00085         {
00086           denom=TINY*((denom<0)?-1:1);
00087         }
00088         // U is abscissa of minimum of parabola that passes through
00089         // (a,fa),(b,fb),(c,fc)
00090         u=b-((b-c)*q-(b-a)*r)/(2*denom);
00091         ulim=b+GLIMIT*(c-b);
00092           
00093         if ((b-u)*(u-c) >0)  // u is between b and c
00094         {
00095           fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00096           if (fu<fc)  // minimum is between b and c
00097           {
00098             a=b;
00099             b=u;
00100             fa=fb;
00101             fb=fu;
00102             break;
00103           }
00104           else if (fu>fb)  // minimum is between a and u
00105           {
00106             c=u;
00107             fc=fu;
00108             break;
00109           }
00110           // parabolic fit didn't get us anywhere
00111           u=c+GOLD*(c-b);
00112           fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00113         }
00114         else if ((c-u)*(u-ulim) > 0.0)  // fit is between c and upper limit
00115         {
00116           fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00117           if (fu<fc)
00118           {
00119             b=c;
00120             c=u;
00121             u=c+GOLD*(c-b);
00122             fb=fc;
00123             fc=fu;
00124             fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00125           }
00126         } 
00127         else if ((u-ulim)*(ulim-c) >=0.0) // limit to maximum value
00128         {
00129           u=ulim;
00130           fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00131         } 
00132         else                  // reject parabolic u, default magnification.
00133         {
00134           u=c+GOLD*(c-b);
00135           fu=simpleF(u,X0,direction);
00136         }
00137 
00138         a=b;
00139         b=c;
00140         c=u;
00141         fa=fb;
00142         fb=fc;
00143         fc=fu;
00144       }
00145     }

00147     double Minimizer::brentMinimize(double ax, double bx, double cx, 
00148                                     vector<double> &X0,
00149                                     vector<double> &dir,
00150                                     double &xmin
00151                                     )
00152     {
00153 
00154       double tol=sqrt(numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
00155       bool ok1,ok2;
00156       int iter;
00157       double a,b,d,d1,d2,du,dv,dw,dx,e=0.0;
00158       double fu,fv,fw,fx,olde,tol1,tol2,u,u1,u2,v,w,x,xm;
00159       const int ITMAX=100;
00160       const double ZEPS=1e-10;
00161 
00162       a=(ax<cx)?ax:cx;
00163       b=(ax>cx)?ax:cx;
00164       x=w=v=bx;
00165       fx=simpleFandDeriv(x,X0,dir,dx);
00166       fw=fv=fx;
00167       dw=dv=dx;
00168     
00169       for (iter=1;iter<=ITMAX;++iter)
00170       {
00171         xm=0.5*(a+b);
00172         tol1=tol*fabs(x)+ZEPS;
00173         tol2=2.0*tol1;
00174         if (fabs(x-xm) <= (tol2-0.5*(b-a)))
00175         {
00176           xmin=x;
00177           break;
00178         }
00179         if (fabs(e) > tol1)
00180         {
00181           // initialize to an out-of-bracket value
00182 
00183           d1=2*(b-a);
00184           d2=d1;
00185           // Secant method
00186           if (dw != dx) d1=(w-x)*dx/(dx-dw);
00187           if (dv != dx) d2=(v-x)*dx/(dx-dv);
00188 
00189           // use d within bracket, and on side pointed to by derivative
00190           u1=x+d1;
00191           u2=x+d2;
00192           ok1=((a-u1)*(u1-b)>0.0 && dx*d1<=0);
00193           ok2=((a-u2)*(u2-b)>0.0 && dx*d2<=0);
00194           olde=e;
00195           e=d;
00196 
00197           if (ok1||ok2) // take only an acceptable d, and smallest if both OK
00198           {
00199             if (ok1 && ok2)
00200               d=(fabs(d1)<fabs(d2)? d1:d2);
00201             else if (ok1)
00202               d=d1;
00203             else
00204               d=d2;
00205             if (fabs(d)<fabs(0.5*olde))
00206             {
00207               u=x+d;
00208               if (u-a < tol2 || b-u<tol2)
00209                 d=(xm-x >0.0)?fabs(tol1):-fabs(tol1);
00210             }
00211             else
00212             {
00213               // do bisection instead, use derivative sign to decide which
00214               // side to look on.
00215               d=0.5*(e=((dx>0)?(a-x):(b-x)));
00216             }
00217           }
00218           else
00219           {
00220             d=0.5*(e=((dx>0)?(a-x):(b-x)));
00221           }
00222         }
00223         else 
00224         {
00225           d=0.5*(e=((dx>0)?(a-x):(b-x)));
00226         }
00227         if (fabs(d) >= tol1)
00228         {
00229           u=x+d;
00230           fu=simpleFandDeriv(u,X0,dir,du);
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234           u=x+(d>0)?fabs(tol1):-fabs(tol1);
00235           fu=simpleFandDeriv(u,X0,dir,du);
00236           if (fu>fx) // if the minimum step in downhil direction takes us uphill,
00237             // we're done.
00238           {
00239             xmin=x;
00240             break;
00241           }
00242         }
00243 
00244         if (fu<=fx)
00245         {
00246           if (u>=x) 
00247             a=x;
00248           else
00249             b=x;
00250           v=w; fv=fw; dv=dw;
00251           w=x; fw=fx; dw=dx;
00252           x=u; fx=fu; dx=du;
00253         }
00254         else
00255         {
00256           if (u<x) 
00257             a=u;
00258           else
00259             b=u;
00260           if (fu<fw||w==x)
00261           {
00262             v=w; fv=fw; dv=dw;
00263             w=u; fw=fu; dw=du;
00264           }
00265           else if (fu<fv||v==x||v==w)
00266           {
00267             v=u; fv=fu; dv=du;
00268           }
00269         }
00270       }
00271 
00272       if (iter>ITMAX) // we took all our allotted iterations
00273         throw(Exception("Too many iterations in brentMinimize"));
00274 
00275       return fx;
00276     }

00278     double Minimizer::lineSearch(vector<double> &X0,vector<double> &dir)
00279     {
00280 
00281       double a=0.0,b=1.0,c=2.0;
00282       double fret;
00283       double xmin;
00284       int vecSize=X0.size();
00285       int j;
00286 
00287       bracketMinimum(a,b,c,X0,dir);
00288       fret=brentMinimize(a,b,c,X0,dir,xmin);
00289 
00290       for(j=0;j<vecSize;++j)
00291       {
00292         dir[j] *= xmin;
00293         X0[j] += dir[j];
00294       }
00295       return fret;
00296     }

00298     double Minimizer::conjugateGradientMinimize(vector<double>&X0,
00299                                                 double ftol,
00300                                                 int &iter)
00301     {
00302       int j,its;
00303       double gg,gam,fp,dgg;
00304       int vecSize=X0.size();
00305       vector<double> g(vecSize);
00306       vector<double> h(vecSize);
00307       vector<double> xi(vecSize);
00308       const int ITMAX=200;
00309       const double EPS=1e-10;
00310       double fret;
00311 
00312       theGroup->setEvaluationPoint(X0);
00313       fp=theGroup->getFunctionValueAndGradient(xi);
00314       for (j=0;j<vecSize;++j)
00315       {
00316         g[j]=-xi[j];
00317         xi[j]=h[j]=g[j];
00318       }
00319       for (iter=1;iter<=ITMAX;++iter)
00320       {
00321         fret=lineSearch(X0,xi);
00322         if (2*fabs(fret-fp) <= ftol*(fabs(fret)+fabs(fp)+EPS))
00323         {
00324           break;
00325         }
00326         theGroup->setEvaluationPoint(X0);
00327         fp=theGroup->getFunctionValueAndGradient(xi);
00328         dgg=gg=0.0;
00329         for (j=0;j<vecSize;++j)
00330         {
00331           gg += g[j]*g[j];
00332           dgg += (xi[j]+g[j])*xi[j];
00333         }
00334 
00335         if (gg == 0.0)   // Unlikely, but if gradient is 0, we're there.
00336         {
00337           break;
00338         }
00339         gam = dgg/gg;
00340         for (j=0;j<vecSize;++j)
00341         {
00342           g[j]=-xi[j];
00343           xi[j]=h[j]=g[j]+gam*h[j];
00344         }
00345       }
00346       if (iter>ITMAX)
00347         throw(Exception("Too many iterations in conjugateGradientMinimize"));
00348       return fret;
00349     }
00350   }
